title: Cheesy broccoli pasta bake
ingredients: ['200g wholewheat penne', '150g broccoli florets', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'olive oil', '3 to 4 rashers bacon, cut into chunks', '20g butter', '20g plain flour', '200ml milk', '1 teaspoon wholegrain mustard', '75g Cheddar cheese, grated, plus extra for sprinkling', 'black pepper, to season']
